effect.scarlet_violet: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4. If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.
effect.the_teal_mask: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4. If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4. If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.
